hero.description: I am an undergraduate student at Pertamina University majoring in Computer Science, with a GPA of 3.89 out of 4.00.

about.detail: I am a passionate Computer Science student who enjoys coding and continuously exploring new technologies. I am actively involved in student organizations, where I develop leadership and teamwork skills. In addition to my academic pursuits, I love sharing knowledge as a tutor, helping others understand programming and tech concepts. I thrive in dynamic environments and am always eager to learn and take on new challenges.
